attributes.action: Make period products free in England
attributes.additional_details: Scotland has made period products free, so why isn't England following through? Periods are a normal thing that happen to every single woman, and it isn't fair that we have to keep paying.
attributes.background: Ban all prices on period products in England.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund free female sanitary products, such as sanitary towels and tampons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
